actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mari lwyd makes one bite attack and one hooves attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Turn Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The mari lwyd has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

special_abilities.name: Turned by Rhyme
special_abilities.desc: A creature can use its action to formally challenge the mari lwyd to a duel of rhymes. If no creature attacks the mari lwyd until the beginning of its next turn, it uses its action to recite a rhyme. The challenger must respond to the rhyme and succeed on a DC 14 Charisma (Performance) check. On a success, the mari lwyd is treated as if it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes damage.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The mari lwydâ€™s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: chill touch, mage hand
3/day each: animate dead, hideous laughter, suggestion
